snippet: This family play that borrows from the commedia dell’arte tradition has donned holiday garb and been adapted since its New York International Fringe Festival appearance.
abstract: Laurel Graeber reviews Spaghetti and Meatball Players production The Commedia Rapunzel: Holiday Extravaganza Pumpkin Spice Latte Edition, written by Sam LaFrage who co-directs with Dennis Corsi and also stars.
lead_paragraph: This family play that borrows from the commedia dell’arte tradition has donned holiday garb and been adapted since its New York International Fringe Festival appearance.

headline.main: Review: ‘Commedia Rapunzel,’ With a Bit of Seasonal Spice
headline.print_headline: She’s Not Alone in Letting Down Her Hair

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: The Commedia Rapunzel: Holiday Extravaganza Pumpkin Spice Latte Edition (Play)
